name: Flickr Comment Focus
description:
New Flickr sucks, it totally dumps on users who like to read and post comments!  This Stylish style expands that tiny left-hand panel to half the screen width, sharing equal screen space with the photo!

Tags: flickr comments emphasis importance feedback retro revert old school
additional_info:
v1 (3.27.2014) Wider comment pane.  Smaller photo pane.  Larger default comment box.
v2 (3.29.2014) Wider description box.  Added comments to the code.
